content: Thank you! I think the change in design/style reflects the change in people. The number of websites has changed together with the amount of information they all carry. Today, users don’t have time (or even don’t want) to read, so in many cases heavy text was replaced with (sometimes also heavy) imagery. But the principles haven’t changed — it’s still the information and the good stories behind it that (should) matter. Good luck with the portfolio!
